name: RHYTHM
description:
This is a Rhythmic musical game where you will have to prove your reaction time by hitting the dedicated key in the same direction as the arrows. This game was made in a 3 day gamejam so don't take this too seriously. I am primarily a VR developer but will obviously keep on making these "pancake" games in gamejams and other events too make sure I don't loose my skills ; ) Despite this I would really appreciate if you could chuck a few bucks over since I've been working for over a year now without getting any money :)

This gamejam was heavily inspired by the vr game beatsaber*
